turns.answer: No. Mafia is a social deduction game, because you want to be like a Mafia. When you're playing a social deduction game, you want to be a 'bad guy' and the more you win the game, the less you play
turns.label: truth

turns.answer:
In South Jersey. I wasn't with Mafia at all at the time. I was doing nothing for my business.
